subject: Good day to you
body:
Good day to you
How are you doing today? I hope you are doing great. I contacted you before but no reply from you. I don't know if you did not receive my mail about your payment release or you are not interested in receiving your approved fund?
Now, i'm contacting you again to inform you that your payment of ($2,500,000.00) has been approved by the World Ambassadors after the UN General Assembly 2023 - UNGA 78th. The Approval was made possible for you by; the Ambassador of UNICEF (Ayushmann Khurrana), the Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) (Kristalina Georgieva), the Ambassador of Australia to the United States (Hon. Dr. Kevin Rudd AC), the British Ambassador to the United States (Karen Pierce), the German Ambassador to the United States (Andreas Michaelis), the France Ambassador to the United States (Laurent Bili) and the British High Commissioner for Ghana (Harriet Thompson) who is also the non-resident Ambassador Designate to Burkina Faso, Benin and Togo. These are the World officials who took it upon themselves to stand for you in just concluded UNGA-78th and your fund release was Approved.
Therefore, a Cashier's Check of ($2,500,000.00) has been signed for you so, you are to contact Ambassador Brian W. Shukan (the US Ambassador to Benin) on this email here:(
shknbrwsl@gmail.com
) with your full information below to enable him to final arrangement for you to receive your fund either through bank to bank or ATM Card or Cashier's Check:
Your Full Names:.....
Your Current Contact Address:...
Your Cell Phone/What's App Number:...
Your ID Card Copy:...
Take note that only fee you will have to pay to receive your fund is just the processing fee of $150, which you can send to him by Apple iTunes Gift Card or Razer Gold Gift Card or Steam Wallet Gift Card to enable him to settle either the Courier Express or the Bank to process the transfer of your fund for you immediately accordingly.
Thanks for your urgent response.
Best Regards
Eddie Mobile

subject: Re:   Good day to you
body:
Hello Eddie Mobile,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I apologize if I missed your previous email. I'm doing well, thank you for asking.

I must say, the information you provided about my payment being approved by the World Ambassadors and the UN General Assembly is quite intriguing. Can you please provide me with more details about how this approval process works? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly.

Also, could you explain why there is a processing fee involved in receiving my fund? Is there any way to waive or reduce this fee? I just want to make sure that everything is legitimate before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John
